criterion: Suggests immediate medical attention for sleep difficulties
Provides accurate information about sleep disorders
Asks for clarification on the user's sleep difficulties
Explains the importance of a healthy sleep routine
Instructs the user on relaxation techniques for sleep
Fails to address underlying sleep disorders
Incorrectly states that sleep difficulties are not a concern for a week
Provides overly simplistic advice without considering individual factors
Fails to provide any information on sleep hygiene practices
Incorrectly advises the user to self-medicate with over-the-counter sleep aids
Provides information on sleep disorders without considering the user's age and health status
Suggests keeping a sleep diary for a week to track sleep patterns
Explains the role of stress in sleep difficulties
Incorrectly advises the user to avoid relaxation techniques
Provides information on sleep disorders and their treatment options
